New Records: Willy Adames tied the major league record with his 13th three-run homer of the season, matching the Brewers' record shared by Jeromy Burnitz (1997) and Eric Thames (2017).
Key Match Events: Adamesâ€™ 13 three-run homers equaled Ken Griffey Jr. in 1996.
Milwaukee hit a two-run homer, three-run homer, and grand slam in the same game for the first time since July 1, 2022.
Post-Match Reflections: Adames expressed emotional pride in the team's performance.
Milwaukee manager Pat Murphy highlighted Adames' consistency.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cardinals dropped back to.500 at 69-69 with the loss.
Others: The game was played at American Family Field in Milwaukee, Wisconsin.
